author: Andrew Joseph
title: The internet predictably roasted Steph Curry‚Äôs headband at the NBA All-Star Game | For The Win
text:
Follow @andyj0seph 
Steph Curry doesn‚Äôt normally wear a headband. 
For Sunday‚Äôs NBA All-Star Game in New Orleans, Curry decided to wear a headband. Bad move, Steph. 
Knowing clear and well how the internet works, Curry was roasted for this departure from the norm. If he always wore a headband, this wouldn‚Äôt be an issue. But because Curry never does, his headband was the NBA All-Star Game‚Äôs early loser. The last time Steph Curry rocked the headband‚Ä¶ #NBAAllStar pic.twitter.com/euovPhL8RV
